ygData.subject: Re: [cantera] Installing Cantera on Windows XP
ygData.msgSnippet: Sean, I don t know what the problem is you are having with MixMaster.  I just installed Cantera on a PC running Windows XP Home Edition and MixMaster ran.  You

Sean,

I don't know what the problem is you are having with MixMaster.  I j=
ust  
installed Cantera on a PC running Windows XP Home Edition and MixMast=
er  
ran.  You need to of course first run the Cantera Python installer  
w=
ithin the folder that running Cantera15.msi creates, but I assume you  
did=
 that.  As far as a graphical interface, MixMaster is the only  
graphical =
Cantera application. The other Python demos are most  
conveniently run fro=
m IDLE. (Right-click on the icon, and select 'Edit  
with IDLE'.)

  For MA=
TLAB, I suspect that it is a version problem.  It looks like you  
are usin=
g MATLAB 5.3, but version 6.5 is needed. Does anyone else have  
experience=
 running Cantera from the Student Edition of MATLAB?

Dave

September 18, 2003, at 02:18 PM, hendersonsjh wrote:
